description:
As Chi-chan and friends are relaxing in Yuka`s room, they notice a strange figure taking pictures of them through the window. They open the window, and there stands Reporter-kun, a reporter for the underground magazine "Weekly Underground" who`s come to make an article about Chi-chan!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pashapasha! Chiteijin Kisha no Dai Scoop Dechi!
Snap, Snap! The Underground Reporter`s Big Scoop!
パシャパシャ! 地底人記者の大スクープでち!
